filters.logicOperator:
Handle value with logic operator like AND | OR | NOT.
Example pod OR deployment
filters.numberOperator:
Handle value with number operator like = | != | > | >= | < | <=
Example: limit > 9000
filters.limitOperator:
Handle value with limit TO operator
Example: 123 TO 1234
filters.doubleQuotes:
Handle value with double quotes.
Example: "Kyma!"
